data.name: Acid Spit
data.description: The [name] targets a 6m radius within 60m and launches a glob of acid that coats the area. Each creature within the area must succeed on a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Until the end of the [name]'s next turn, each creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also make the saving throw.

data.name: Acid Spit Attack
data.description: The [name] makes an acid spit attack.

data.name: Acid Splash
data.description: The ravager spits acid in a 6m cube. Each creature in that line must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Acid Spray
data.description: The [name] regurgitates acid in a 10-meter line that is 4 meters wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Activate Radar Jamming
data.description: The [name] activates its radar jamming.

data.name: Aggressive
data.description: As a bonus action, the [name] can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

data.name: Ambusher
data.description: The [name] has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

data.name: Amphibious
data.description: Can breathe both air and water.

data.name: Arm Cannon
data.description: [dmg: 1d10 + dex] piercing damage.

data.name: Armor-piercing Ammo
data.description: Damage done by the [name]'s ranged weapons cannot be reduced by piercing damage resistance.

data.name: Assassination
data.description: Once per turn, the [name] can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to one creature it hits with an attack if it has advantage on the attack roll. The attack must be made with a melee or ranged weapon.

data.name: Assassinate
data.description: During its first turn, the [name] has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the [name] scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

data.name: Assume Control
data.description: The harbinger targets a friendly collector that is not incapacitated. The target creature becomes possessed and gains the benefits listed on its monster sheet. The harbinger can only assume control of one creature at a time. While it is assuming control, its speed becomes 0, attacking creatures have advantage, it automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws, and it cannot cast any spells. If the harbinger is incapacitated, assume control ends. The harbinger can use its bonus action to end assume control. As a result, the targeted creature loses all benefits including any temporary hit points and barrier ticks.

data.name: Avoidance
data.description: If the [name] subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

data.name: Barrier
data.description: As an action or bonus action, the [name] gains [bt].

data.name: Bash
data.description: [dmg: 1d8 + str] bludgeoning damage.

data.name: Bash---geth_juggernaut
data.description: [dmg: 2d8 + str] bludgeoning damage.

data.name: Bash Attack
data.description: The [name] makes one bash attack.

data.name: Bite---pyjak
data.description: [dmg: 1d4 + str] piercing damage.

data.name: Bite---varren
data.description: [dmg: 2d4 + dex] piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC [dc] Strength saving throw or be knocked {prone}.

data.name: Bite---varren-alpha
data.description: [dmg: 2d6 + dex] piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC [dc] Strength saving throw or be knocked {prone}.

data.name: Bite---yahg
data.description: [dmg: 2d10 + str] piercing damage.

data.name: Blood Frenzy
data.description: The [name] has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

data.name: Bloodlust
data.description: After reducing an enemy to 0 hit points with a melee attack, the [name] may take another Action this turn.

data.name: Brutal Charge
data.description: If the brute moves at least 6m straight toward a target and then hits it with a smash attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC [dc] Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

data.name: Brute
data.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the [name] hits with it.

data.name: Bubble Barrier
data.description: The [name] expends one barrier tick to create a spherical barrier surrounding itself. Until the start of its next turn, it has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. In addition, ranged power attacks against the [name] have disadvantage.

data.name: Cannibalize
data.description: The cannibal spends its action consuming a creature with 0 hit points within 2m. At the start of its next turn it gains 5 AC and 1d8 hit points and the consumed creature (including all of its weapons, armor, and items) is completely dissolved. If the creature is a player character, it dies. Cannibals prefer to use their cannibalize action over any other.

data.name: Cast a Spell
data.description: The [name] casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

data.name: Claw
data.description: [dmg: 6d10 + str] piercing damage.

data.name: Claw---yahg
data.description: [dmg: 2d8 + str] slashing damage.

data.name: Cloaking Device
data.description: The [name] has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

data.name: Clobber
data.description: [dmg: 5d12 + str] bludgeoning damage.

data.name: Collector Web
data.description: The target is restrained by organic webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC [dc] Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

data.name: con-freeze
data.description: frozen

data.name: con-lift
data.description: lift

data.name: con-poison
data.description: poisoned

data.name: con-sense
data.description: blinded, deafened

data.name: Create Armor Plating
data.description: The marauder coats a friendly husk, abomination, or cannibal in a scab-like armor plating, increasing the target's AC by 2.

data.name: Cryo Ammo
data.description: On a successful ranged attack against an {unprotected} target, the target must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or becomes {frozen} for 1 turn.

data.name: Death Burst
data.description: When the [name] dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 2m of it must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Defibrillators
data.description: 1d4 lightning damage.

data.name: Deploy Turret
data.description: The [name] is equipped with 1 Turret (see Bestiary). As an action, the [name] can deploy the Turret on a level surface within 2m. The Turret is controlled by the [name] and takes its turn at the end of the [name]'s turn. The [name] can use an action to stow the Turret, placing it at another location with a subsequent action.

data.name: Destroy Terrain
data.description: When the [name] moves via burrowing, the ground it moves through becomes difficult terrain.

data.name: Detect
data.description: The [name] makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

data.name: Disruptor Ammo
data.description: Successful ranged attacks deal twice as much damage to the target's shields.

data.name: Distortion Rocket
data.description: 2d6 thunder damage.

data.name: Drop Klixen
data.description: If the [name] is within a region that contains Klixen, it begins the fight by droping 1d10 Klixen in a 6m by 20m area.

data.name: Egg Sacs
data.description: If the ravager takes piercing or slashing damage that is not from the result of a critical hit one of its egg sacs explodes, releasing 1d10 swarmers.

data.name: Eject
data.description: The pilot of the Atlas ejects, landing in an unoccupied space within 40m. The pilot is an Assault Trooper. The Atlas then self-destructs. Each creature within a 6m radius must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 39 (6d12) thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.

data.name: Evasion
data.description: If the [name] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the [name] instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

data.name: Eye Cannon
data.description: [dmg: 3d6 + dex] radiant damage.

data.name: Fire Breath
data.description: The [name] exhales a 6-meter cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Frightful Presence
data.description: Each creature of the [name]'s choice that is within 60m of the name and aware of it must succeed on a DC [dc] Wisdom saving throw or become {frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [name]'s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

data.name: Fury of the small
data.recharge: Recharges after a Short or Long rest
data.description: For 1 minute, the Volus deals 1d4 damage to successful spell and weapon attacks against creatures of Medium-size or larger.

data.name: Geth Pulse Rifle Attack
data.description: The [name] makes a Geth Pulse Rifle attack.

data.name: Grapple
data.description: The creature is grappled (escape DC [dc-str]). At the start of the [name]'s next turn, it uses Post-Mortem Explosion.

data.name: Grappler
data.description: The [name] has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

data.name: Grasp
data.description: [dmg: 2d12 + str] bludgeoning damage and 13 (2d12) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC [dc]). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the [name] can't grasp another target.

data.name: Guard
data.description: When a creature the [name] can see attacks a target other than itself that is within 2m of it, it can use its reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

data.name: Hallucinogen
data.description: The drell's skin is infused with a mild venom. When ingested or injected it can cause mild hallucinations.

data.name: Harvester Cannon
data.description: The reaper harvester targets a location within 30m. Each creature within a 6m radius must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 3d10 force and 3d10 thunder damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Harvester Cannon Attack
data.description: The [name] makes a harvester cannon attack.

data.name: Heated Body
data.description: A creature that touches the [name] or hits it with a melee attack while within 2m of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

data.name: Heavy Shield
data.description: While the [name] has their Heavy Shield equipped, it gains +2 AC and has resistance bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

data.name: Hermetic Suit
data.description: When the quarian takes an unshielded, critical hit that deals piercing damage, its suit becomes breached. On the quarian's turn, it can take no other action except expending a charge of specialized sealant to close the puncture (1 charge). If it has no remaining charges, it becomes {poisoned}.

data.name: Hex Shield
data.description: As a bonus action, the [name] generates a 2m tall and wide, hexagon-shaped shield with 5AC and 50 shield points which offers full-cover.

data.name: Hungry Jaws
data.description: As a bonus action, the vorcha can make a Bite attack. If the attack hits, it deals its normal damage, and automatically activates Bloodlust.

data.name: Hunter Mode
data.recharge: Recharges after a Short or Long rest
data.description: For 1 minute the geth can activate its hunter mode, gaining the following: increase speed by 6m, +2 on ranged & melee attack roll and damage rolls, add 1d4 to any tech power damage rolls.

data.name: Impale
data.description: [dmg: 3d8 + str] piercing damage.

data.name: Impale Attack
data.description: The [name] uses its imaple attack.

data.name: Incendiary Ammo
data.description: On a successful ranged attack, the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or take 1d8 fire damage and an additional 1d8 fire damage on the start of its next turn.

data.name: Kamikaze Attack
data.description: When the [name] is within 2m of an enemy creature, it explodes. Each creature within a 2m radius must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 1d12 thunder damage, or half as much on a successful one.

data.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
data.description: The [name] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

data.name: Leadership
data.recharge: Recharges after a Short or Long rest
data.description: For 1 minute, the [name] can utter a special command or warning whenever a non-hostile creature that it can see within 10m of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its role provided it can hear and understand the [name]. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the [name] is incapacitated.

data.name: Leap
data.description: The [name] can leap up to one half its speed.

data.name: Legendary Resistance
data.description: If the [name] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

data.name: Martial Advantage
data.description: Once per turn, the [name] can deal an extra [dmg] damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 2m of an ally of the [name] that isn't incapacitated.

data.name: Mass Accelerator Cannon
data.description: [dmg: 5d8] radiant damage.

data.name: Mass Accelerator Cannon Attack
data.description: The [name] makes a Mass Accelerator Cannon attack.

data.name: Mass Accelerator Machinegun
data.description: The [name] targets a creature within 60m and fires a 2m wide, 60m long line of bullets. Each creature within the line's path must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage and 7 (2d6) radiant damage or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Mass Accelerator Machinegun---geth_armature
data.description: The [name] targets a creature within 60m and fires a 2m wide, 60m long line of bullets. Each creature within the line's path must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 19 (3d12) piercing damage and 19 (3d12) radiant damage or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Mass Accelerator Machinegun---geth_colossus
data.description: The [name] targets a creature within 60m and fires a 2m wide, 60m long line of bullets. Each creature within the line's path must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 19 (3d12) piercing damage and 19 (3d12) radiant damage or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Mass Accelerator Machinegun Attack
data.description: The [name] makes a Mass Accelerator Machinegun attack.

data.name: Move---thresher_maw
data.description: The [name] moves up to half its speed.

data.name: Negation Barrier
data.description: When targeted by a biotic spell or tech power, the [name] can use its reaction to gain 2 barrier ticks and gain resistance to force, necrotic, cold, lightning, and fire damage until the start of its next turn.

data.name: Pack Tactics
data.description: The [name] has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [name]'s allies is within 2m of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

data.name: Palm Blaster
data.description: 16 (3d10) thunder damage.

data.name: Parry
data.description: The [name] adds 3 to its AC against one melee weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the [name] must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

data.name: Pincer
data.description: [dmg: 1d4 + dex] piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

data.name: Pistol Whip
data.description: [dmg: 1d4 + str] bludgeoning damage.

data.name: Plague Sting
data.description: [dmg: 1d4 + dex] poison damage and 2 (1d4) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on DC [dc] Constitution saving throw or has disadvantage on its next attack roll.

data.name: Possessed Captain
data.description: When the captain is possessed by a harbinger it gains temporary hit points equal to its total hit points and 8 barrier ticks. While it has barrier ticks it also gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. Instead of summoning a seaker swarm, it summons a seeker plague.

data.name: Possessed Collector
data.description: When the [name] is possessed by a harbinger it gains temporary hit points equal to its total hit points and 6 barrier ticks. While it has barrier ticks it also gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

data.name: Possessed Praetorian
data.description: When the [name] is possessed by a harbinger it gains 10 barrier ticks and while it has barrier ticks it also gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. It can use its action to launch 2 missiles at a single or different target creatures within 60m. Each target must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a target takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage, or half as much on a successful one. Once the [name] fires its missiles, it cannot do so again.

data.name: Possessed Scion
data.description: When the [name] is possessed by a harbinger it gains temporary hit points equal to its total hit points and 8 barrier ticks. When the possessed [name] makes a salvo attack, it can target six locations instead of three.

data.name: Post-Mortem Explosion
data.description: When the [name] dies, it explodes in a burst of necrotic energy. Each creature within 2m of it must succeed on a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that is grappled by the [name] automatically fails its saving throw.

data.name: Post-Mortem Vent
data.description: When the [name] dies, it vents excess heat from its weapon and armor in a 2m radius until the start of its next turn. Each creature that enters the radius for the first time or ends its turn there takes [dmg] radiant damage.

data.name: Pounce
data.description: The [name] pounces to a location within 14m and makes a claw attack.

data.name: Pulse Cannon
data.description: [dmg: 1d10 + dex] radiant damage.

data.name: Pulse Rifle
data.description: [dmg: 1d4 + dex] radiant damage.

data.name: quarian resistance
data.description: poison, necrotic

data.name: Radar Jamming
data.description: The [name] releases an emp burst that temporarily disables targeting systems. Each hostile creature within a 10m radius has disadvantage on ranged weapon attack rolls until the start of the [name]'s next turn.

data.name: Rage
data.recharge: Recharges after a Short or Long rest
data.description: If the [name] begins its turn with less that 1/2 of its hit points, it enters into a rage. The [name]'s melee weapon attacks deal one extra die of its damage. This effect lasts 1 minute.

data.name: Reaper Infection
data.numberOfTargets: one organic creature that is grappled by the [name], incapacitated, or restrained
data.description: [dmg: 1d6 + str] piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. An organic creature slain in this way becomes a Weakened Adjutant and becomes an Adjutant after a long rest.

data.name: Relentless
data.description: If damage reduces the [name] to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is from a critical hit. On a success, the [name] drops to 1 hit point instead.

data.name: Repair
data.description: The [name] uses its action to repair a friendly, synthetic target within 2m for 1d8 hit points.

data.name: Repair Matrix
data.recharge: Recharges after a Short or Long rest
data.description: If the construct begins its turn with less than 1/2 of its hit points, it activates its repair matrix, regaining 1d6 hit points at the start of its turn. This effect last one minute or until the construct becomes incapacitated.

data.name: Repair Protocol
data.description: If the [name] starts its turn with 0 shield points, it activates its repair protocol, collapsing into a compact shell. Until the start of its next turn, its speed becomes 0m and it can take no Actions, but it is immune to all damage. At the start of its next turn, it regains 50 shields points.

data.name: res-biotic
data.description: force, necrotic

data.name: res-lightning
data.description: lightning

data.name: res-standard
data.description: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing

data.name: res-tech
data.description: fire, cold

data.name: res-thunder
data.description: thunder, piercing

data.name: Rocket Launcher
data.description: The [name] targets an area within 60m. Each creature within 4m of the target must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 19 (3d12) thunder damage or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Salvo
data.description: The [name] targets three locations within 30m and launches an explosive blast to each. The locations can be the same or different. Each creature within a 6m radius of a target location must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 15 (3d10) thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.

data.name: Saving Face
data.description: If the [name] misses with an attack roll or fails an ability check or a saving throw, it can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies it can see within 10m (maximum bonus of +5).

data.name: Self-Destruct
data.description: When the [name] dies, it explodes. Each creature within 4m of it must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw, taking [dmg] thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Shadow Cloak
data.description: While in dim light or darkness, the [name] can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

data.name: Shield Restore
data.description: The [name] restores 9 (2d8) shield points to a friendly creature within 4m.

data.name: Shock Attack
data.description: [dmg: 1d6 + dex] lightning damage.

data.name: Shredder Ammo
data.description: Successful ranged attacks on an unprotected, organic target deals an additional 1d4 slashing damage.

data.name: Siege Cannon
data.description: The [name] targets a creature within 60m and launches a homing projectile. The target must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 55 (10d10) radiant damage, or half as much on a successful one.

data.name: Siege Cannon Attack
data.description: The [name] makes a Siege Cannon attack.

data.name: Siege Monster
data.description: The [name] deals double damage to objects and structures.

data.name: Siege Pulse
data.description: The [name] releases a burst of electrostatic energy that disrupts armor biofeedback. Each creature within a 6m radius must make a DC [dc] Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature wearing armor looses 1d4 to their Strength and Dexterity ability scores. This loss ends if the armor is repaired, removed, or replaced.

data.name: Siege Pulse Attack
data.description: The [name] uses its Siege Pulse

data.name: Slow Moving
data.description: The [name] has disadvantage on all Dexterity saving throws and skill checks.

data.name: Smash
data.description: [dmg: 3d8 + str] bludgeoning damage.

data.name: Smash Attack
data.description: The [name] makes a Smash attack.

data.name: Sneak Attack
data.description: The [name]  deals an extra 13 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 2m of an ally of the [name] that isn't incapacitated and the [name] doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

data.name: Spawn Husks
data.description: The reaper harvester releases 1d10 Husks from its body.

data.name: Spider Climb
data.description: The [name] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

data.name: Stabalize
data.recharge: Recharges after a Short or Long rest
data.description: The [name] can stabalize a friendly creature within 2m.

data.name: Stationary
data.description: The [name] automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws and skill checks.

data.name: Sting
data.description: [dmg: 1d4 + dex] poison damage and the target must succeed on a DC [dc] Constitution saving throw or has disadvantage on its next attack roll.

data.name: Stomp
data.description: [dmg: 2d6 + str] piercing damage.

data.name: Stomp Attack
data.description: The [name] makes a stomp attack.

data.name: Suicide Attack
data.description: [dmg: 1d6] acid damage and the swarmer explodes (its hit points immediately fall to 0).

data.name: Summon Combat Drone
data.description: The [name] summons a Combat Drone. It can only have 1 Combat Drone active at a time.

data.name: Summon Geth Turret
data.description: The [name] summons a Geth Turret.

data.name: Summon Seeker Swarm
data.description: The [name] summons 1d4 seeker swarms at an unoccupied space it can see within 10m.

data.name: Summon Turret or Drone
data.description: The [name] uses its Summon Drone or Summon Geth Turret action.

data.name: Surprise Attack
data.description: If the [name] surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra [dmg] damage from the attack.

data.name: Swallow
data.description:
The [name] makes one grasp attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the grasp's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the [name], and it takes 56 (16d6) acid damage at the start of each of the [name]'s turns.
--If the [name] takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the [name] must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 4m of the [name]. If the [name] dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 12m of movement, exiting prone.

data.name: Swipe
data.description: [dmg: 1d6 + str] slashing damage, and the creature is grappled (escape DC [dc]). A creature that is grappled by the [name] takes 11 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the husk's turns. The husk can't make swipe attacks on any other target while grappling a creature in this way.

data.name: Tactical Cloak
data.description: As a bonus action, the [name] activates its tactical cloak, becoming {invisible}. When the [name] makes a melee, ranged, or uses a tech or combat power, tactical cloak ends.

data.name: Tail
data.description: [dmg: 4d6 + str] bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC [dc] Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

data.name: Tail Attack
data.description: The [name] makes a tail attack.

data.name: Teleporting Dodge
data.description: In response to making a Dexterity saving throw, the [name] can use its reaction to teleport up to 4m away. If it is still within the affected area, it has advantage on the saving throw.

data.name: Trample Attack
data.description: The [name] moves 10m in a straight line moving over Large or smaller creature in its path. Each creature caught in its path must succeed on a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw or take [dmg: 2d6 + 8] piercind damage and be knocked {prone}. The [name] cannot move through a Hugh or larger creature.

data.name: Twin Artillery Cannons
data.description: [dmg: 3d10 + dex] piercing damage and 10 (3d6) acid damage.

data.name: Twin Particle Beams
data.description: The [name] shoots particle beams in a 10m line that is 4m wide originating from itself. Each creature within the area must make a DC [dc] Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 54 (12d8) radiant damage or half as much on a successful one.

data.name: Wail
data.description: The [name] lets out a wail. Each creature within 60m that can hear the wail must make DC [dc] Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save a creature is {frightened} for 1 minute.

data.name: Wail Attack
data.description: The [name] uses its wail.

data.name: Warp Ammo
data.description: Successful ranged attacks on a target with an active barrier will strip away 2 barrier ticks and reduce the damage reduction by half. Warp ammo can detonate primed targets.

data.name: Weapon Strike
data.description: [dmg: 1d6 + str] bludgeoning damage.

data.description: [dmg: 1d10 + str] bludgeoning damage.
